meaning: She is the energy/wife of dharma (righteousness). She possesses the traits of dharmi and hence is Dharmini.
commentary: He who possesses in him the traits of dharma is ‘dharmi’. Dharma and dharmi are two different words. The fire burns everything and it is following its dharma. The Fire God (Agni) possesses this capacity to burn and hence he is dharmi. Agni is Dharmi and to burn is his dharma.
